cliVerb.name: generate
cliVerb.summary: Generates C# code for a schema from the Schema Registry.

examples.title: Generate code for a schema by ID
Generate code from a local schema file (Bash)

examples.body: PS C:\> Get-Content .\example-model.avsc | dotnet avro generate | Out-File .\ExampleModel.cs
examples.title: Generate code from a local schema file (PowerShell)

options.name: registry-url
options.summary: The URL of the schema registry.
